== Introduction ==

The <nowiki>[[MichiganTeam|Michigan]]</nowiki> LoCo team wants to start a computer recycling and donation program.

== Purpose ==

To accept computer donations from personal, business, and/or government agencies and refurbish them to a usable state.  The computers will then be donated to various organizations/groups that are in need of computers.

* Possible equipment Donors:

** Universities

** Businesses we have contacts with

** ...

* Possible Recipients include:

** Schools

** Community Centers

** Shelters (Women's, Homeless, etc)

** ...

* Possible parters:

** ReCellular in Dexter (deals with recycling cell phones)

== Other Examples ==

It is always nice to have a sense of how others go about doing similar projects, so here I will keep a list of place/groups that share our goal.

* http://freegeek.org/

* http://www.accrc.org/

** A video of that group: <nowiki>[[http://ryanishungry.com/2007/05/04/accrc-james-burgett-saving-computers-from-the-landfill/|link]]</nowiki>

* Arizona LoCo Team is doing <nowiki>[[ArizonaTeam/Teams/Computers4Kids| Computers4Kids]]</nowiki>

* more to come
